Here, you can relax and unwind in your one-, two- or three-bedroom apartment with multiple floorplan options to suit your needs. Our brand-new amenities capture the feel of a resort, featuring our stunning resort-style pool, clubroom, fitness center and more. Enjoy world-class living in a prime location, with our Branch Avenue Metro Location within walking distance connecting you anywhere you need to go. Live a life in full at Aspire.

Description: At Carmel Midtown Square DC apartments near the Metro, you can choose from a variety of one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans to find your ideal home. Each unit includes generous features that maximize your space, from 9-foot ceilings and walk-in closets to private patios or balconies that welcome the outdoors to your roomy layout. Plus, with premium amenities such as granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, you can rest assured that your living space is designed for the ultimate in comfort and convenience. Discover happiness at home each day when you choose Carmel Midtown Square.

Description: FREE RESERVED GARAGE PARKING SPACE AND FULL SIZE W/D! Call today! Tribeca at Camp Springs offers very unique floor plan options at affordable rates. Combine our unique homes, Summer rates, fabulous location and our OUTSTANDING AWARD WINNING Management and Maintenance Team and there's never been a better time to lease at Tribeca at Camp Springs. We are located right across the street from the Branch Avenue DC Metro Station. We offer gourmet kitchens with chef islands, Stainless Steel appliances, huge walk-in closets and extra storage, pantry and linen space, large open concept rooms with floor to ceiling windows, limited (FOB access) entry, 24 Hour fitness center, and elevators, just to name a few! Call today for your personal tour of our models and community!

Description: Your Home Base. Your Own Space. Metroplace. Apartments on the Green Line. A short walk to the metro puts you minutes to DC, The National Harbor, Northern Virginia and Joint Base Andrews. Multi-million dollar renovation completed! A brand new amenity suite features fitness and cardio center, community clubhouse, indoor sports court, pool with outdoor kitchen and BBQ, tot lot and more! Each totally renovated apartment features chef's kitchen with granite counters, hard surface plank flooring, two-tone custom paint, private patio or balcony and garage parking. Pets Welcome--no weight limit! Ask about our 3% Military and Teacher Discounts. Find out what all the buzz is about!

All of this located on a quiet street close to shopping centers and minutes from the National Harbor!

Description:
(800) 331-0646 - Luxurious living is waiting for you in this stunning home, perfect for a growing family! This warm and inviting home features gleaming hardwood floors throughout the main living areas making it simple to keep clean. A large eat-in kitchen will fill you with extreme culinary joy; from its sleek black appliances, abundance of granite countertops and island, as well as the large pantry and many cherry cabinets it will brighten your day and make it easy to keep organized. The master suite is stunning and spacious with a private bath including a double sink vanity, garden tub and large walk in shower all beautifully tiled it will be your oasis to relax and recharge. The two additional bedrooms are also spacious with one being a ready-made nursery with cute animal decals means you can relax as it is already decorated for your new family member. As if that’s not enough there is newly added large deck off the kitchen perfect for enjoying the summer days outside, or entertaining family and friends. Don’t think that’s enough room for you? Think again, as this home also has a large basement you can make into a second family room, or playroom which stays bright from the walkout doors to the tranquil backyard. Conveniently maintenance free and with access to a serene walking trail. Nestled in this community you have access to the community tennis courts, swimming pool, basketball court, playground, and gym letting you make the most of your family time together. Don’t just take our word for it, call Marketplace Homes at 1-800-331-0646 and set up a showing to see if this is the right home for you.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3533879) Other Amenities - Unfurnished, Pool, Exercise Facility, Smoke Free, Basement, Garage, Yard, Deck. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Microwave. Lease lengths - 12 Months, 24 Months. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Resident Pays Electricity, Resident Pays Gas, Resident Pays Water, Trash Pick-up Included. Pet policies - No Pets Allowed.
